record.title: JOINT REFERRAL OF NOMINATION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the nomination of R. Lyle Laverty, of Colorado, to be Assistant Secretary for Fish and Wildlife, sent to the Senate by the President on March 26, 2007, be referred jointly to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources and the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
